overview:
David began his career working for several multi-national advertising agencies and grew to Sr. VP, Executive Creative Director. His area of expertise was creative, and later in his career he was instrumental in the growth of agencies through new business acquisition.

He left advertising in 2000 to seek funding and begin to build his current company, Ad Giants. Since landing funding in January of 2001, his primary investor has been T. Boone Pickens of Dallas (BP Capital) and another private investment group also in the Dallas area. Ad Giants has grown to become a significant brand and leader in the “brand management software” industry, creating several proprietary systems they have implemented for many Fortune 100 companies.

Ad Giants was recently awarded a United States Patent for their proprietary “ONE System” that serves as the foundation for all business systems. In February of 2010, Ad Giants launched an online marketing ecosystem targeting small to medium sized businesses to provide a scalable, subscription-based “marketing on demand portal” called MODsocket.
